sentences.english: In total, during the 16th century Crimean Tatars invaded Russia 91 times.

sentences.english: This served as the background of the military alliance between the Swedish Kingdom and the Crimean Horde.
sentences.chinese: 這就成爲瑞典王國和克里木部落之間的軍事同盟背景。
